lines.text: [Bob Eubanks' farewell speech on the December 20, 1974 finale]

And now, on our last show on the current stage of "The Newlywed Game," on behalf of the staff at Chuck Barris Productions, I'd like to thank all of our viewers for your loyal support, and, in addition, I want to send along a special apprecitaion to the almost ten thousand young newlywed couples who'd joined us on this stage, and whose great spirits and good humor...
made the past eight and a half years a real pleasure.
I can't say it. Thank you very much.
